Baccarat

This is an incredibly exciting card game where you will have amazing chances to win big. Historically, this is the game of kings. It first appeared in the territory of modern Italy in the distant 1500s. Then baccarat quickly began to spread throughout Europe. Here it gained incredible popularity in the 19th century and is still considered one of the most exciting card games.

At the same time, the rules are very similar to blackjack. Here you also have to fight the dealer and collect a winning combination of cards. Depending on the number of points from your cards, you can win, lose or play a draw.
Roulette

The halls of these fantastic casinos have many gaming tables. Many of them are popular varieties of roulette. Australian players prefer to visit halls with European, French and American roulette. Although they are similar in appearance, the games differ in rules and some winning bets.
Sic Bo

This game has several names that are widely known all over the world. For example, in Eastern countries it is called "The Treasure of the Dice". The game requires certain skills, abilities, and also mandatory knowledge of the rules. Therefore, come to the Australian casino fully prepared. Competitors will not let you just take their winnings.
Blackjack

Apart from poker, blackjack is probably the most famous card game in the world. The essence of the gameplay is extremely simple. You play against the dealer and take cards. Each card gives a certain number of points. To win, you need to collect 21 points or the closest possible number to this value. If you have 22 or more, you automatically lose.

If you have less than 21, but the dealer has collected an even weaker combination, for example, 19 against 18, then you take the winnings. This makes the gameplay quite dynamic. But at the same time, the maximum level of intrigue and tension is always maintained.
Poker

A classic card game that will not leave anyone indifferent in Australian casinos. These three gambling houses host poker tournaments, and also have 24-hour gaming tables. This allows you to play for fun or compete with professional players for the maximum prizes.
Caribbean Stud

This game is one of the varieties of poker. It is in many ways similar to traditional 5-card poker. However, there are certain differences in the game that concern winning combinations and ways to achieve victory. Therefore, you should study all the rules in advance and join the fight for prizes. This casino creates the best atmosphere for playing poker.

Casino Perth Crown has several exclusive halls with games and the highest level of service for its VIP clients. You'll need a membership card to visit this beautiful hall. Here you will find all sorts of gambling entertainment, full service, bars and restaurants, and fantastic live music.

This is a special loyalty program for regular customers who can increase their level, earn special points and receive additional rewards for this. There are 5 membership levels in total. Depending on your progress, you will receive a corresponding member card.

It is important to note that the rewards program membership cards you received at one of the Crown Casinos are issued separately for each of the gambling houses. Therefore, you will not be able to use the accumulated points at a Sydney casino if you received a card at a Melbourne casino, for example. These are new rules that officially came into force in mid-2024.
